bio.summary: I'm a web developer with a passion for open source and maintainable code. I love keeping up to speed with technology and discussing software practices with other passionate persons. I have a sweetspot for the outdoors and am always learning new things.

work.summary: Developed solutions for clients from small to enterprise for custom Microsoft CRM and Salesforce. Projects involved creating web API's, web portals, input controls, and service plugins.
highlights: Integrated with many clients' web service API's.
Created a full suite of input controls to mimic Microsoft CRM 2013 forms.
Managed the internal JavaScript library to interface with Microsoft CRM through JavaScript.
Implemented autogenerated documentation for the internal JavaScript library.
Created scheduled data loading and merging solutions for Salesforce.
Used Knockout to recreate a client's Excel spreadsheet in an HTML user form.

work.summary: Developed the Roster DNS config manager for Purdue University.
highlights: Implemented RFC 4632 for CIDR block expansion.
Developed a simple solution for deploying to client machines using Fabric.
Created documentation to help clients use Roster.
